name: GetSurveyQuestionAnswers
description:
Retrieve answers for a specific survey question.

Use this tool to get answers for a particular question in a given survey. Useful for analyzing survey responses to specific questions within Mailchimp.

parameters.name: survey_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the survey whose question answers are being retrieved.

parameters.name: survey_question_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the survey question to retrieve answers from.

value_schema.description: The ID of the survey question.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: Specify fields to exclude from the response using a comma-separated list. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: filter_by_respondent_familiarity
parameters.description: Filter survey responses based on the familiarity level of the respondents. Accepts a string value.

value_schema.description: Filter survey responses by familiarity of the respondents.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: respondent_familiarity_is
parameters.description: Filter survey responses by familiarity of the respondents.

value_schema.description: Filter survey responses by familiarity of the respondents.

parameters.name: question_id
parameters.description: The ID of the survey question.

value_schema.description: The ID of the survey question.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
